channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Aero Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Aero Desktop

item.title: CVE-2024-30275|2024-06-04T17:39:17.895Z -- adobe -- adobe%20aero%20desktop
item.description: Adobe Aero Desktop versions 23.4 and earlier are affected by a Use After Free vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. Exploitation of this issue requires user interaction in that a victim must open a malicious file.
